Item.name: Music Player
Item.description: Music Player

Item.name: Decorative Speaker
Item.description: Speaker with animation when active

Item.name: Outpost Music Player
Item.description: Hidden Music Player for outpost modules

Item.name: Portable Music Player
Item.description: A portable music player capable of playing cassettes and CDs. Keep away from water! Can be repaired with a screwdriver.

Item.name: CD: Pirate Rave
Item.description:
A CD featuring a variety of tracks often heard when dealing with pirates. 
Track-List:
1. Alien Syndicate (Re_]|M|[_ix) by _]|M|[_
2. Abandon Ship by Simon Chylinski
3. Scavenger Hunt Techno (EurocorpFx Remake) by EurocorpFx
4. The Rebel Path by P.T. Adamczyk
5. Contra la Luna by P.T. Adamczyk
6. Cyborg by Full Kontakt

Item.name: CD: Subnautica OST
Item.description:
A CD featuring a some tracks from the Subnautica OST. 
Track-List:
1. Abandon Ship by Simon Chylinski
2. Exosuit by Simon Chylinski
3. Red Alert by Simon Chylinski
4. Seamoth by Simon Chylinski

Item.name: CD: GRIP OST
Item.description:
A CD featuring a some tracks from the GRIP OST. 
Track-List:
1. Clock Watch by Full Kontakt
2. Cerbera by Imperium
3. Cyborg by Full Kontakt
4. Black Out by Full Kontakt

Item.name: CD: Forgive Me Father OST
Item.description:
A CD featuring a some tracks from the Forgive Me Father OST. 
Track-List:
1. Forgiveness Is Divine by Tim Fialka
2. Good Time For You To Get Angry by Tim Fialka
3. Big Ugly Fish Pt.1 by Tim Fialka
4. Big Ugly Fish Pt.2 by Tim Fialka
5. Rain And Pain by Tim Fialka
6. Sweetie, Get Me Bazooka by Tim Fialka
7. Welcome To Pestisville by Tim Fialka
8. A Crow's Breakfast by Tim Fialka
